socialConnections.title: Social Media Integration

facebook.tooltip: Connect your Facebook Page to schedule insurance campaign posts, analyze engagement, and capture incoming leads.

notifications.title: Notification Preferences
notifications.description: Control how you receive real-time alerts for important events.
notifications.permissionDenied: Notification permission was denied. You can change this in your browser settings.

permissionDeniedWarning.title: Notification Permissions Required
permissionDeniedWarning.description: To receive real-time alerts, you need to allow notifications for this site in your browser settings. Please follow the instructions for your browser below.
permissionDeniedWarning.chromeSteps:
1. Click the lock icon (ðŸ”’) in the address bar.
2. Next to 'Notifications', select 'Allow'.
3. Reload the page.
permissionDeniedWarning.safariSteps:
1. Go to Safari > Settings (or Preferences).
2. Click on the 'Websites' tab.
3. Select 'Notifications' from the sidebar.
4. Find this site in the list and select 'Allow'.
permissionDeniedWarning.edgeSteps:
1. Click the lock icon (ðŸ”’) in the address bar.
2. Under 'Permissions for this site', set 'Notifications' to 'Allow'.
3. Reload the page.
permissionDeniedWarning.learnMore: Learn more at official browser support pages.
